actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide credits to small businesses and their employees for health insurance coverage.
short_title: Small Business Health Care Affordability Act of 2009

summary.text: Small Business Health Care Affordability Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain small employers (generally, employers of 50 or fewer employees) and their employees tax credits for health insurance costs.

titles.title: Small Business Health Care Affordability Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide credits to small businesses and their employees for health insurance coverage.
